description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. The world is your weapon! Use the colour from the world around you to fight enemies and solve puzzles. Features unlockable game modes with multiple endings.
description.short: The world is your weapon! Use the colour from the world around you to fight enemies and solve puzzles. Features unlockable game modes with multiple endings.
